simplified: 不做亏心事，不怕鬼敲门

pronunciation.pinyin: bù zuò kuī xīn shì , bù pà guǐ qiāo mén
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: bu4 zuo4 kui1 xin1 shi4 , bu4 pa4 gui3 qiao1 men2

details.simplified: 不做亏心事，不怕鬼敲门
details.traditional: 不做虧心事，不怕鬼敲門

meanings.value: He who never wrongs others does not fear the knock in the night.
